notes_translated.fr: Les transferts gouvernementaux constituent la seconde composante la plus élevée des revenus totaux des particuliers, tout juste après le revenu d’emploi (gains). Les transferts gouvernementaux, comme les pensions de vieillesse, les prestations d’assurance-emploi, les prestations fiscales pour enfants et le crédit pour taxe sur les produits et services, constituaient 10 cents (en moyenne) pour chaque dollar de revenu.
notes_translated.en: After employment income (earnings), government transfer payments make up the next largest component of total income for individuals. Government transfer payments, such as old-age pensions, employment insurance benefits, child tax benefits and Goods and Services Tax credits, contributed 10 cents of every dollar (on average) to family income. Family income is the combined income of all family members from all sources before income taxes are deducted.

subject: economics_and_industry
